Package org.lavajuno.jfskmodem.waveforms

Class Waveforms

java.lang.Object
org.lavajuno.jfskmodem.waveforms.Waveforms
public class Waveforms extends Object
Waveforms provides functionality for generating space+mark tones and training cycles.

  • Method Details

    • getSpaceTone

      public static List<Short> getSpaceTone(int baud_rate) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Generates a single space tone for the given baud rate.
      Parameters:
      baud_rate - Baud rate to use for generation
      Returns:
      Space tone frames as a list of shorts
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the baud rate is not a factor of 48000 or not divisible by 4
